item.title: ÃŸios (YT)
item.description: Notes https://youtu.be/5il_kB_4L2s Based on the Animenz arrangement: Video, Sheets. Another shot at this song! This time with the new recording environment (and no pressure from live streaming ğŸ˜…), and also with a new me having gone through some internal turmoil (see the rant posts before this lol). Post from previous attempt Outside of the recording quality, this take is arguably not so much better than my previous run, but there are several changes that I’d note as improvements.

item.title: å¤‰ã‚ã‚‰ãªã„ã‚‚ã®
item.description: Notes Video: https://youtu.be/_xTmQi57xmk Sheets: https://gakufu.poly2d.xyz/kawaranaimono.pdf Writing this retroactively. The cover was posted on Mar 13. Sheets were completed in May afterwards. My first piano arrangement, and a special song for a special occasion. This initial intent was to present sheets to accompany the video in March. But I ended up abandoning it - the more I tried to work on it, the more I found the idea “limiting”.

item.title: ãã¡ã¥ã‘Diamond
item.description: Notes Based on the Animenz arrangement Video: https://youtu.be/P6C3szts5C4 Sheet: https://sheet.host/sheet/IGm7F5 This was a ‘high reach’ piece for me in terms of difficulty. But it’s a special song and a cover had to be done. The most difficult segments of the song are the chorus which feature fast left-hand jumps. Many retakes were done due to a lack of accuracy here. While less obvious, “first verse” at 0:39 (measures 25-32) was also quite challenging.

item.title: åƒæœ¬æ¡œ (YT)
item.description: Notes First YouTube upload! The previous Periscopes were captured entirely on phone, but this was the first attempt at using an audio interface in search for better sound quality. I mixed in elements from a few inspirations. Flowering Night from the Touhou series was used at 1:34 (a nod to Niconico covers) and a variation based on Lindsey Stirling’s cover at 1:47. The “guitar riff” part of the song was skipped in favor of a more gentle bridge and reprise.

item.title: Twice 4th Anniv Medley (live)
item.description: ğŸ¹ Twice we FANCY YOU (medley) #Twice4thAnniversary #TWICEMakesMeFeelSpecial #Twice #piano #live https://t.co/EZKzmqV0gK — Ryu (@poly2d) October 20, 2019 Excerpts FANCY (~0:00) What is Love? (~2:00) Like OOH-AHH (~3:28) Dance the Night Away (~4:57) Heart Shaker - outro (~6:45) Notes I stuck to the A-side tracks for this medley. I just used the songs that came to my mind, but if I were to retroactively state a reason for each:

item.title: Bios - Guilty Crown (live)
item.description: ğŸ¹ Guilty Crown - Î²ios ã‚®ãƒ«ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¦ãƒ³ OST #Piano #Music https://t.co/mhtr6ELk5O — Ryu (@poly2d) October 14, 2019 Notes Based on the Animenz arrangement Video: https://youtu.be/DcjUOdeq6G8 Sheet: https://sheet.host/sheet/1uMLWW Original: https://youtu.be/UMCka_vXtL4 The soundtrack of the Guilty Crown series was what led me to find Animenz on youtube in early 2012. I found his cover of ÃŸios. I had some lessons during my childhood, but by this time I had absolutely forgotten how to play piano.

item.title: åƒæœ¬æ¡œ / Senbonzakura (live)
item.description: ğŸ¹ åƒæœ¬æ¡œ / Senbonzakura live piano #åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ç”Ÿèª•ç¥­2019 #HatsuneMikuBirthday https://t.co/HNJVg866Mn — Ryu (@poly2d) September 1, 2019 Notes Original: https://youtu.be/P6C3szts5C4 This live of Senbonzakura was for a special occasion: 13th anniversary of Hatsune Miku! I have fond memories of this song because my roommates and I played it a lot in Taiko no Tatsujin. I borrowed some small nuances and snippets from two of my favorite covers of this song (listed below) - can you spot them?

item.title: NGE Medley (live)
item.description: This was the first piano post I shared on Twitter! The hype in this day and age was how Neon Genesis Evangelion was coming to Netflix (at least for a subset of the internet ğŸ™‚).
